abstract: Republican Herman Cain’s presidential campaign has generated much promise, but it may have undermined itself with questionable decisions and a series of missteps; slip-ups, including Cain's contradictory and sometimes befuddling remarks, have led to the impression that Cain lacks focus and preparation.
snippet: Herman Cain’s presidential campaign has generated much promise, but it may have undermined itself with questionable decisions and a series of missteps.
lead_paragraph: Herman Cain’s presidential campaign has generated much promise, but it may have undermined itself with questionable decisions and a series of missteps.

headline.main: As Cain Promotes His Management Skills, Ex-Aides Tell of Campaign in Chaos
headline.print_headline: As Cain Promotes His Management Skills, Ex-Aides Tell of Campaign in Chaos
headline.seo: As Cain Promotes Management Skills, Ex-Aides Tell of Chaos
